thread.title: Evelyn R Lishenko
thread.title_full: OLDIES.com reviewed by Evelyn R Lishenko

author: Evelyn R Lishenko
title: Evelyn R Lishenko
text: I enjoy the CD's from my earlier years. Mostly I just sing or listen to them. I also dance for about 1/2 to 1 hour a day to them, sometimes slow but sometimes fast, It's the best exercise and it helps my entire body. I would recommend that anyone that likes older music review what is available.
